preferences: The user tends to choose challenges categorized as easy or intermediate difficulty rather than hard challenges.
The user seems to prefer challenges that have a direct impact on the environment.
The user is interested in challenges related to consumption and waste management, as well as energy and resource conservation.
growth_plan: Continue to provide challenges that promote waste reduction and proper waste sorting, such as composting, reducing single-use plastics, and recycling correctly.
Encourage sustainable consumption habits by introducing challenges related to responsible shopping, supporting local and sustainable brands, and reducing overall consumption.
Introduce challenges that encourage stepping out of the comfort zone, such as exploring sustainable fashion choices, adopting a plant-based diet, and embracing green technologies.
